values.name: Chat
values.description: Engages in a conversation with the AI, offering insights and suggestions.

values.name: Autocomplete
values.description: Provides inline code suggestions as you type, enhancing development speed.

values.name: Code Completion
values.description: Offers full-function or block-level code completions based on context.

values.name: Commit Message Suggestion
values.description: Suggests commit messages based on code changes.

values.name: MISC
values.description: Miscellaneous small features and experimental enhancements that improve user experience.
